positions.description: Investing at Sauce.vc - seed fund for digital first consumer brands. Team's track record includes The Whole Truth, XYXX, Mokobara,  Epigamia, Innovist, Supertails and others.

experience.title: Project Manager
experience.description: Myra is a Matrix Partners ($600mn fund in India) funded online pharmacy delivering 4000+ orders a day (3rd largest in India)Led a team of 5 to plan, budget and execute all offline campaigns for marketing.– Added 30,000+ customers at an average CAC of ₹200 (900% lower than industry average), generating an estimated  LTV of ₹60 crsResearch Projects– First order experience tracking and funnel optimization by improving user flow.– Surveyed brick and mortar pharmacies for category expansion.– Customer survey(s) for increasing features, and expansion into other healthcare verticals

experience.title: Marketing Associate
experience.description: VWO is the flagship product of Wingify, it is an A/B testing and conversion optimization platform trusted by brands such as BBC, Disney, Dominos.Executed projects end to end, to increase sales, optimize user funnel and utilize potential white spaces. Also, conducted experiments to create growth channels and improve performance of key web pages
